title: IBM security advisory (AV25-790)
description: Between November 24 and 30, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following:
products: IBM Astronomer with IBM  versions 1.0.0 to 1.0.1
IBM QRadar Deployment Intelligence App  versions 1.0.0 to 3.0.18
IBM watsonx Orchestrate Developer Edition  versions 1.4.0 to 1.12.0
IBM watsonx Orchestrate Developer Edition  versions 1.4.0 to 1.14.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
